definitions.definition: Lacking kindness , sympathy , benevolence , gratitude , or similar; cruel , harsh or unjust ; ungrateful .
Not kind ; contrary to nature or type ; unnatural .
Having no race or kindred ; childless .

main_definition: Lacking kindness , sympathy , benevolence , gratitude , or similar; cruel , harsh or unjust ; ungrateful . [from mid-14th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) Not kind ; contrary to nature or type ; unnatural . [from 13th c.]
( obsolete ) Having no race or kindred ; childless .
